original_text: And I am sure of this, that he who began a good work in you will bring it to completion at the day of Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 너희 안에서 착한 일을 시작하신 이가 그리스도 예수의 날까지 이루실 줄을 우리는 확신하노라

sentences.original_text: And I am sure of this,
that he who began a good work in you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 안에서 선한 일을 시작하신 그분이

sentences.original_text: at the day of Jesus Christ.
